name: A f r a i d (Test)
name_original: A f r a i d (Test)
description:
A Test for a new game I'm making. No colors other than Shades of Yellow and Gray-scale. Will improve the character, animation and stuff after but for now here's the test game. Please see if there are any bugs at the moment. Thanks!
Also the door to the house only takes you nowhere so before you Criticize me in the comments, read this description.
